title: Maoist Takeover
description: We open Season 3 with a live show at William and Mary Law School, part of the Scalia-Ginsburg Collegiality Speaker Series. With our first-ever guest, we discuss the limits of friendship and offer advice on civil disagreement. But first we break down the Supreme Court's ruling on an important stay application from Yeshiva University.
author: pod@dividedargument.com (Will Baude & Dan Epps)

But first we break down the Supreme Court's ruling on an important stay application from Yeshiva University.
